name: locke-api
description: A generic API for a locke-implementation, dealing with access control and encryption
author: Jakob Mattsson <jakob.mattsson@gmail.com> (jakobmattsson.se)

scripts.coverage: jscov src .cov && SRC_DIR=.cov mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script --reporter mocha-term-cov-reporter tests/mocha/*.coffee
scripts.test: mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script tests/mocha/*.coffee && cucumber-js tests/cucumber-features --require tests/cucumber-steps/api.coffee
